title: Lag Since Last Patch
body: Ever since the last patch i've consistently had terrible connections in game, before the last patch i had constant 30 ms in 90% of my games and i know this is a league only issue because i play other games like HotS and overwatch with steady uninterrupted connections. I already tried using all the options the hextech repair tool gives me without success and i submitted a ticket with files showing my game logs. If anyone has had this issue before please give me any kind of advice. Rip me trying to resolve this before urf ends {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We'll need to get a better idea of where the hiccup is coming from, like a local network issue or even how your ISP is routing to us.  Let's run a traceroute to find out!  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.

This information helps but...holy cow!  Is this the only line?  If so, your phones connection is incredibly high at your home before leaving.  Are you on a phone tether?  Having your data as your network plan is likely the cause of these issues.  A wired connection to a router would be your best bet, though the service provided by your phone might not be stable enough to cover League.

i just pulled up the app you told me to and put in the ip you gave me, my computer is connected to the 5g network from my router, i have no clue why it says my phone. like i said before i never had severe packet loss issues like this prior to a week and a half ago.
What information do you want me to send after doing as you instruct? screenshot?
